response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you, worth $1,500,000. After careful consideration and negotiation, I am pleased to offer you this unique item at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer represents a significant saving compared to its true worth and is designed to ensure you can secure it without straining your budget. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
